title: I have a fresh pigeon's abandoned egg with me. What should I do with it? Is there any chance the baby can come out? - Quora

response.answer_text: If it was abandoned the chances are very, very high that the egg failed to hatch under parental care so I would dispose of it. There are more than enough pigeons around as it is and the parents will simply lay another pair of eggs.
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Jerone Lois Oreta
